about_the_game:
Tuition Academia is a life simulator game where you take control of a female protagonist. You're tasked with the goal of paying off your student debt any way you can, whilst balancing the day-to-day of college. It's a perverted world out there, and you can either use it, or it can use you!

This eroge combines roleplaying elements with an open world that lets you play any way you want. Your main character will slowly become more corrupt as they try to earn a seemingly insurmountable amount of money. They'll become more open to risqué and higher-paying jobs, and who knows what kind of person they'll become with a career path like that?

With an almost endless number of choices, what will be your story? 

  • 75+ Sex Scenes and Sex CG with a variety of scenarios and kinks.
  • Fully integrated pregnancy and contraceptive system. Every scene has a pregnant version.
  • Roleplaying mechanics and stats that allow you to play your character however you want.
  • Customize your character's name, personality, traits, clothes, hair color, and more!
  • Open-ended world map with 16 unique locations to visit. 
  • 6 named female characters and 1 male character to get to know.
  • 11 possible endings based on your choices. All viewable in one playthrough.
  • One special secret ending for those that complete the game.

content_descriptors.notes: Tuition Academia features explicit sexual content. It's set in a university, where all the characters are aged 18 and above. It features sex scenes with full frontal nudity and penetration. It also contains scenes of sexual assault, non-consensual sex, drug and alcohol abuse, abortion, bondage, and self-harm.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: x86/x86_64
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.9
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Tuition Academia

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Take control of a customizable female protagonist in an exciting, role-playing, life simulation game where you try to pay off your student debt. Work several risqué side jobs while trying to balance the day-to-day of college. How far will you go to earn that money? Will you remain innocent?
